name: Football Arena
description:
Football Arena - Alpha Version

A realistic soccer game inspired by the arena mode in FIFA
Try to score as many goals as possible in a very realistic soccer game. In this version you can play as Gabriel Strefezza, a footballer from my favorite soccer team, Lecce, which plays in the Italian Serie A league. Try to beat  the Lecce goalkeeper Wladimiro Falcone and score goals in the Via del Mare stadium in Lecce.
The goalkeeper AI predicts the trajectory of the ball and tries to catch it. The game has realistic physics and realistic real-time sun position based on latitude and longitude of the stadium.

Interactive Cloth Physics by Obi -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/obi-cloth-81333

Animations by mixamo and Super Goalie -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/super-goalie-basic-144535

Note that this is my first unity game made in few weeks using a low-end notebook.

Currently my goal for this game is to make it very similar to the EA Sports FIFA arena, with the ability to take free kicks and penalties. Soon, if I have time, I'll try to make it more complete by adding more game modes.

OS: Windows x64
Resolution: 1280x720

KEYBOARD
D - Shoot
E - Sprint
Arrow Keys - Move / Shoot Direction 
V - Change Camera

XBOX CONTROLLER
B - Shoot
RT - Sprint
Left Stick - Move / Shoot Direction 
View button - Change Camera 

Simone Causo
